sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; class App extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { name: '', email: '', cpf: '', endereco: '', cidade: '', estado: '', tipo: '', resume: '', cargo: '', descCargo: '', } } removeSpecial = () => { } handleChange = ({ target }) => { this.setState({ [target.name]: target.value, }) } render() { return (
